biotools.summary: Tool to train and apply gradient boosting classifiers to predict TFBSs within ChIP-seq data sets by combining sequence and DNA shape information. Sequence information is encoded using either classical PWMs, TFFMs, or 4-bits. DNA shape features are obtained from the GBshape browser.

bioschemas.name: DNAshapedTFBS
